00036   class Stream : public IStream
00037   {
00038     VS_JNIUTILS_REFCOUNTED_OBJECT_PRIVATE_MAKE(Stream)
00039   public:
00040 
00041     // IStream
00042     virtual Direction getDirection() { return mDirection; }
00043     virtual int getIndex();
00044     virtual int getId();

00055     static Stream * make(Container* container, AVStream *, Direction direction);
00056 
00057     // The StreamCoder will call this if it needs to
00058     virtual void setTimeBase(IRational *);
00059     virtual void setFrameRate(IRational *);
00060 
00061     // Called by the managing container when it is closed
00062     // at this point this stream is no longer valid.
00063     virtual int containerClosed(Container* container);
00064 
00065     virtual int32_t acquire();
00066     virtual int32_t release();
00067 
00068     virtual IRational* getSampleAspectRatio();

00070     virtual const char* getLanguage();

00072

00075     virtual void setParseType(ParseType type);
00076 
00077     virtual int32_t setStreamCoder(IStreamCoder *coder);
00078     
00079     virtual AVStream* getAVStream() { return mStream; }
00080

00082     virtual void setMetaData(IMetaData* metaData);
00083

00087         int64_t wantedTimeStamp, int32_t flags);

00089         int64_t wantedTimeStamp, int32_t flags);
00090     virtual IIndexEntry* getIndexEntry(int32_t position);
00091     virtual int32_t addIndexEntry(IIndexEntry* entry);
00092 
00093   protected:
00094     Stream();

00096
